dict.acceptation: 观念，概念；观点；思想，设想，想法；总的印象；

sent.orig: Plate concept: real estate concept, the concept of share transfer.
sent.trans: 板块概念：房地产概念、股权转让概念。

sent.orig: In the experiment of creativity in concept combination, grade influences strategies of concept combination.
sent.trans: 概念结合创造性实验中，策略的使用受年级的影响。

sent.orig: Train and audIt'store Shifu (including concept & professional skills) and the application of the concept.
sent.trans: 培训并检查门店师傅（包括概念和专业技能）以及确保新概念的实施。

sent.orig: The classical economists worked out instead, a different concept-the concept of [i]functional prices and [i]functional wages.
sent.trans: 与此不同，正统经济学家则代之以[b]有效价格和[b]有效工资的概念。

sent.orig: All knowledge demands a concept and a concept is always universal and serves as a rule.
sent.trans: 一切知识都要求有一个概念，这个概念就其形式而言在任何时候都是某种普遍的东西，是用作规则的东西。
